titleStmt.title: The office and duetie of an husband, made by the excelle[n]t philosopher Lodouicus Viues, and translated into English by Thomas Paynell
titleStmt.author: Vives, Juan Luis, 1492-1540.
Paynell, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Pouls Churcheyarde, by Iohn Cawood, prynter vnto the Quenes hyghnes[,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Thomas Paynell, of Juan Luis vives' work.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
